name: McDermott Will & Emery Belgium LLP
membership: None that are relevant to the anti-dumping proceeding
memberOrga: We do not have member organisations.  We are a law firm.
goal: Representation of clients in anti-dumping and anti-trust proceedings.  At present we represent Oxaquim SA, the Spanish producer of oxalic acid in an anti-dumping expiry review investigation.
euInitiatives: Anti-dumping expiry review proceedings concerning oxalic acid from China and India
